title: PL-GIFT Algorithm Meta-Parameters
technique_changes: Switched the classifier to SVM; Added real model inputs to the jacobian analysis instead of only using synthetic input

train_C.description: Inverse of regularization to use in the LogisticRegression.

train_nsamples.description: The number of random input samples to use to generate the jacobian.

train_holdoutratio.description: The split ratio for holdout data.
